title: If Rick Astley intended to become prime minister, what would his campaign slogan be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Interviewer: “Mr. Astley, what would you say to someone who asks if they should support your campaign? Mr. Astley: “I Ain't too proud to beg.” Interviewer: “What qualities make for a great PM?” Mr. Astley: “Well, I'd have to say It would take a strong, strong man.” Interviewer: “Wait, are you excluding women?” Mr. Astley: “No, it never hurts to have Angeles on your side.” Interviewer: “How is your relationship with the press?” Mr. Astley, “Well, I like the Sun.” Interviewer: “What do you think of your potential American counterpart's antics? What do you think drives him?” Mr. Astley: “Clearly, it's a Cry for Help. But if anyone thinks I'd be his lackey, I'll tell them what I told Mr. Trump: 'I don't want to be your lover.’” Interviewer: “On the question of loyalty, how would you respond to critics who charge that you're not in it for the long haul?” Mr. Astley: “I would tell them that we're Together Forever.” Interviewer: “On the subject of defense, how would you respond to an attack on Great Britain?” Mr. Astley: “To anyone foolish enough to consider an attack on this great nation, I'd warn them that it would be Lights Out!” Interviewer: “Has your campaign chosen a unifying theme or slogan?” Mr. Astley: “Yes, I'm Never gonna…” … Editor: “Unfortunately, due to technical difficulties were unable to continue the interview. Our apologies.”
As you might have guessed by now…: “Never gonna give you up! Never gonna let you Down!” He would basically Rickroll all the country at once! Just thinking about it makes me laugh…
